content: I've been thinking about expanding my cleaning routine to other areas, actually. Now that I've got the living room and dining room under control, I'd like to tackle the bedrooms and bathroom. I've been trying to do a load or two of laundry every Sunday afternoon, which has been helping me stay on top of it, but I think I need to focus more on dusting and tidying up the bedrooms. Do you have any tips on how to keep bedrooms tidy and organized?
